Class PaymentReceiptScreenController

  • java.lang.Object

    public class PaymentReceiptScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for the Payment Receipt screen, responsible for displaying the payment receipt details.

        Parameters:
        order - The order object containing payment information.
        park - The park object related to the order.
        visitor - The visitor object who made the payment.
